TopicTitle: [1.12.X] Tantares - Stockalike Soyuz and MIR [16.1][28.05.2024][{Proton Revamp]

Articles.Content:
@Curtquarquesso: where did you find the " bubble fairing " for venera 9 ?, impossible to build something close to it. ( in 1st page video).

Procedural Fairings!

Had to delete several comments here of T'Flok, Comatorium420 and Deltac.

Please, guys, let's keep the discussion out of politics, rule 2.2b (and no reaction vids, 2.3c). I'm sorry, but let's try to keep the community as friendly as it was before.

Had to delete several comments here of T'Flok, Comatorium420 and Deltac.

Please, guys, let's keep the discussion out of politics, rule 2.2b (and no reaction vids, 2.3c). I'm sorry, but let's try to keep the community as friendly as it was before.

Okay. No reaction vids? Meh, forgot that one. Never been good with rules.

Anyway, wonder when will Beale be coming back

Anyway' date=' wonder when will Beale be coming back[/quote']

I'm watching you!

Not back for a long time.

@Curtquarquesso: where did you find the " bubble fairing " for venera 9 ?, impossible to build something close to it. ( in 1st page video).

Tricky procedural fairing tricks! Two halves, with rounded end parts. Just play around with them.

Had to delete several comments here of T'Flok, Comatorium420 and Deltac.

Please, guys, let's keep the discussion out of politics, rule 2.2b (and no reaction vids, 2.3c). I'm sorry, but let's try to keep the community as friendly as it was before.

Hey Friendly neighborhood moderator.

Okay. No reaction vids? Meh' date=' forgot that one. Never been good with rules.

Anyway, wonder when will Beale be coming back[/quote']

Hmm. Not sure...

I'm watching you!

Not back for a long time.

Hey! There he is.

I apologize for the lack of content lately. This week has consisted of an exam, preparation for a High Altitude Balloon project, and preparation for some travel and a move this weekend. Beale and I have been working on how the Capella/ATV rear docking port works. I've got some of the parts in Unity, and the existing configs have been modified in preparation. Input on the ATV engine would be nice. Is it too strong? To weak? Just right?

Tricky procedural fairing tricks! Two halves, with rounded end parts. Just play around with them.

You could also try plaing around with the fillet settings on one of the shapes to make round takes out of one procedural part.

I'm watching you!

Not back for a long time.

Eh, my question was a poorly made one. I'm sorry I'm so out of whack. This dry/humid sauna-esque summer air over here prevents my brain from getting oxygen properly so for the past few weeks I've not been feeling good at all. Trying to breath anywhere is like being in a sauna. It's painful.

Apart from my usual summer misery (last summer was too hot, even just sitting on a chair was enough for sweat to start pouring). Anyway my question should've been this: "Wonder when will Beale be returning to modding, how long of a break is it in rough estimate? No rush, just wondering."

I'm watching you!

Not back for a long time.

Watch away, oh loafing one! Still rolling that theoretical Mir 3 around in my head. It's got its own mind palace now, so I can walk around it and not miss things. I'll try to make you proud. Now, go be a fantastic dad. We've got things covered.

Edited July 17, 2015 by Jack Wolfe

Hey, I had an idea for Beale when he comes back, or for someone else to try (I don't know how hard it is or if it's even possible in a ModuleManager config): flags on the parts. I found some Kerbalised world flags that I love, but my Soyuzes feel quite lacking without a "UKKR" flag.

Hey, I had an idea for Beale when he comes back, or for someone else to try (I don't know how hard it is or if it's even possible in a ModuleManager config): flags on the parts. I found some Kerbalised world flags that I love, but my Soyuzes feel quite lacking without a "UKKR" flag.

That's something I'm absolutely working on.

Edited July 17, 2015 by curtquarquesso

Wow moderators are really efficient, I didnt even have time to see what caused the deletion of our messages haha! didn't mean to start any flames sorry!

What I was saying is that Astrium will not work on the ATV anymore as they only do defense contracts and sold their patents to Lockheed and Excalibur wich will intend to use the parts for the Orion and Excalibur Almaz.

- - - Updated - - -

Speaking of the ATV, i got a serious bug with the Capella being 1.25m with 2.5m attachment nodes.

At first it happened just when I launched it and changed scene, when I'd come back to the craft the core would be off scale but then it got permanently bugged along one of the latest updates.

There are some mods that could tamper with it in the pictures (btw Ioncross and USI life support is a BAD mix) but I tried it on fresh install with only Tantares and dependecies installed, with and without Tweakscale and the Q tweakscale configs.

I'm runnin on a linux 64 version with a LOT of mods but like I said the bug happens regardless of the mods.

Is it a known bug with an easy fix that I have missed (If so, sorry for making you repeat yourself) or am I the unluckiest Tantares fan who has his favorite craft Fubar for some mystical reason?

Wow moderators are really efficient, I didnt even have time to see what caused the deletion of our messages haha! didn't mean to start any flames sorry!

Was just me reacting reasonably to real life space programs being used only in warfare.

No flames happened IMO, the other person who commented me just liked my reaction and that was the end of it.

Anyway, don't know how to help with that bug. It be preferable if it didn't happen at all.

Hello and thank you for this awesome mod:)

I am now playing with RSS/RO and unfortunatelly have some problems. Firstly, when I start the game, it tells me about 4 mistakes. Secondly, I found some strange things with Souz capsule and oters: "Show UI" button doubles, some of attachement nodes are deeper, than they should and RCS thrusters are outside the capsule.

I can fix this attachement bugs for myself, but finding that 4 mistakes is impossible for me. Other bugs, like changing sizes, when I load saved game (For example when Salut station is real sized one of it's parts becomes kerbal-sized) are annoying too... My be someone, who writes configs for RO will see this message)

I'm new on this forum and hope this message is not an off-top in this thread.

Also, sorry for my English..)

Edited July 17, 2015 by agv

agv,

No problems with your English. A lot of people here are not native speakers anyway. I am not sure if you used tables on purpose but to paste code from cfg's, most people use code tags. It is just code and /code inside square brackets.


cfgFileStuff
{
   A := X*Y + B/D;
}

Tricky procedural fairing tricks! Two halves, with rounded end parts. Just play around with them.

I've only copied and pasted this code from RealismOverhaul Github repository. Thank you, tag /code is much better to use)

There are two tanks (on the screenshots) 7.10L and 785L, both have it's own UI, but only the second tank appears in .cfg file. And it is empty...


MODULE
    {
    name = ModuleFuelTanks
    volume = 785
    type = ServiceModule
    basemass = -1
    TANK
    {
      name = Food
      amount = 126
      maxAmount = 126
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = Water
      amount = 71.4
      maxAmount = 71.4
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = Oxygen
      amount = 1890
      maxAmount = 26460
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = Waste
      amount = 0.0
      maxAmount = 63
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = WasteWater
      amount = 0.0
      maxAmount = 113.4
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = CarbonDioxide
      amount = 0.0
      maxAmount = 900
    }
    TANK
    {
    name = ElectricCharge
    amount = 43200
    maxAmount = 43200
    }
    TANK
    {
      name = HTP
      amount = 20
      maxAmount = 20
    }
    }
